00010 using namespace TREX::utils;

00013 namespace {
00014   PositionHandler::factory::declare<PositionHandler> ph_decl("Tracker");

00017 PositionHandler::PositionHandler(PositionHandler::xml_arg const &arg)
00018   :MessageHandler(arg), 
00019    m_asset(parse_attr<std::string>(factory::node(arg), "asset")) {
00020   m_exchange += "_pb";
00021 
00022   provide(m_asset);
00023   notify(TREX::transaction::Observation(m_asset, "undefined"));
00024   m_fresh = false;
00025 }
00026 
00027 bool PositionHandler::handleMessage(amqp::queue::message &msg) {
00028   MBARItracking::PlatformReport report;
00029   
00030   if( report.ParseFromArray(msg.body(), msg.size()) ) {
00031     if( report.has_name() && m_asset==report.name() ) {
00032       time_t secs;
00033       double lat, lon;
00034       
00035       // Check that it has the necessary attributes
00036       if( report.has_epoch_seconds() ) {
00037        secs = report.epoch_seconds();
00038        if( report.has_latitude() ) {
00039          lat = report.latitude();
00040          if( report.has_longitude() ) {
00041            lon = report.longitude();
00042            double north, east;
00043            geo_to_utm(lat, lon, north, east);
00044            m_position.update(secs, north, east);
00045            m_fresh = true;
00046            return true;
00047          }
00048        }
00049       }
00050     } 
00051   }
00052   return false;
00053 }
00054 
00055 bool PositionHandler::synchronize() {
00056   if( m_fresh || m_position.have_speed() ) {
00057     TREX::transaction::Observation obs(m_asset, "Holds");
00058     time_t now_t = std::floor(tickToTime(now()));
00059     long int dt;
00060     point<2> vect(m_position.position(now_t, dt));
00061     double lat, lon;
00062     
00063     m_fresh = false;
00064 
00065     double dtick = dt;
00066     dtick /= tickDuration();
00067     
00068     obs.restrictAttribute("freshness", IntegerDomain(std::floor(dtick+0.5)));
00069 
00070     obs.restrictAttribute("northing", FloatDomain(vect[0]));
00071     obs.restrictAttribute("easting", FloatDomain(vect[1]));
00072     utm_to_geo(vect[0], vect[1], lat, lon);
00073     obs.restrictAttribute("latitude", FloatDomain(lat));
00074     obs.restrictAttribute("longitude", FloatDomain(lon));
00075     
00076     if( m_position.have_speed() ) {
00077       obs.restrictAttribute("speed_north", FloatDomain(m_position.speed()[0]));
00078       obs.restrictAttribute("speed_east", FloatDomain(m_position.speed()[1]));
00079     }
00080     notify(obs);
00081   }
00082   return true;
00083 }
